modality_alignment.interpretation: Very weak correlation - visual signal exists but is minimal

visual_manifold.interpretation: No meaningful visual clustering - visual features may not align with categories

bpr_hardness.interpretation: Moderate negative difficulty - room for improvement
bpr_hardness.recommendation: Consider mixing random and hard negative sampling

graph_connectivity.interpretation: PASS: Giant component covers 100.0% of items (threshold: 50.0%). Graph is sufficiently connected for LATTICE.

feature_collapse.interpretation: WARNING: Avg cosine similarity = 0.620 (pass: <0.5, collapse: >0.9). Features show moderate similarity. May work but suboptimal. Consider testing with alternative visual encoder.

semantic_alignment.interpretation: Very weak correlation (r=-0.0058): Text descriptions do NOT predict user behavior. Users likely buy based on visual appeal, brand, or price rather than descriptions.
semantic_alignment.recommendation: Deprioritize text encoder in final model, or use text only as filter/fallback.

cross_modal_consistency.interpretation: LOW cross-modal agreement (avg=-0.020): Text and image embeddings point in different directions. This indicates a fundamental mismatch - either descriptions don't match images, or encoders have domain shift.
cross_modal_consistency.recommendation: Investigate: (1) Check if product images match descriptions, (2) Fine-tune encoders on domain, (3) Use separate modality branches.

cca_alignment.interpretation: STRONG CCA correlation (1.000). Good linear relationship between modalities.
cca_alignment.recommendation: MICRO contrastive loss should converge well.

anisotropy.interpretation: ANISOTROPIC: Avg cosine = 0.620 (>0.4). Centering FIXED the issue: after centering = 0.001. Embeddings were in a narrow cone but centering spread them out.
anisotropy.recommendation: Apply mean centering to all embeddings before using in MRS models. This should significantly improve LATTICE/MICRO performance.

user_consistency.interpretation: MODERATE CONSISTENCY: Some visual preference signal exists. Local (0.350) < Global (0.380). Ratio = 0.920.
user_consistency.recommendation: Visual features have some predictive power. Consider combining with text features for better performance.
